summary:
## Moon Landings: A Quick Summary

The first spacecraft to reach the Moon was Luna 2 in 1959. In 1969, Apollo 11 made the first crewed landing. Between 1969 and 1972, there were six crewed landings and many robotic ones. After 1972, no one returned to the Moon until 2013. Recently, in 2019, a Chinese spacecraft landed on the Moon's far side for the first time.

Neil Armstrong's first steps on the Moon were watched by around 500 million people worldwide, the biggest live TV audience at that time.
title: Moon landing
